db:abstract.db:para: The Qt 5 Core Compat module provides compatibility with Qt Core APIs.

db:article.db:para: The Qt 5 Core Compat module contains the Qt 5 Core APIs that were removed in Qt 6. The module facilitates the transition to Qt 6.

db:section.db:title: Using the Module
db:section.db:para: Using a Qt module requires linking against the module library, either directly or through other dependencies. Several build tools have dedicated support for this, including CMake and qmake.

db:section.db:title: Building with CMake
db:section.db:para: Use the find_package() command to locate the needed module component in the Qt6 package:
db:section.db:programlisting: find_package(Qt6 REQUIRED COMPONENTS Core5Compat) target_link_libraries(mytarget PRIVATE Qt6::Core5Compat)
db:section.db:para: For more details, see the Build with CMake overview.

db:section.db:title: Building with qmake
db:section.db:para: To configure the module for building with qmake, add the module as a value of the QT variable in the project's .pro file:
